items.summary:
Replace the placeholder Facebook and WhatsApp share links with the exact user-provided destinations throughout the UI.
- Facebook must open: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61575264476230
- WhatsApp must open a chat to: 9804968758 (use a wa.me link that works in mobile/desktop)
Update every place the app currently links to https://facebook.com and https://wa.me (e.g., Landing page footer and Dashboard share card/footer).

Make the displayed phone number(s) tappable to open the device dialer.
- Wherever the phone numbers are shown (Landing page contact strip, Dashboard header contact strip, Dashboard footer, Landing footer), render them as tel: links.
- Ensure at least 9804968758 is tappable via tel:9804968758 (and apply the same behavior to the other displayed number as well).

Ensure the provided logo is actually present as a static asset and used consistently in all existing header/hero/footer locations where the app currently references /assets/logo-job.jpg. - Add/replace the logo file at frontend/public/assets/logo-job.jpg so it is included in the deployed build. - Keep the existing usages working (Landing page hero, Landing footer, Dashboard header/footer, Admin header).

Change admin access to be password-only using the exact password "@rewan10" with no Internet Identity requirement, and lock the entire admin panel behind this password.
- Add an admin password gate UX for /admin routes: if the correct password has not been entered in the current session, show a password prompt instead of the admin UI.
- Store the unlocked state in session storage (or equivalent) so refreshes keep the admin unlocked for the current browser session.
- Remove the current Internet Identity dependency for accessing AdminLayout (do not require identity to view /admin when the password gate is satisfied).
- Keep all user-facing text in English.

Update the backend to support password-authorized admin operations (so admin CRUD works without Internet Identity).
- Add password-guarded variants (or update existing methods) for admin-only operations used by the admin UI:
  - createJobVacancy, updateJobVacancy, deleteJobVacancy
  - createPost, updatePost, deletePost
- The backend must validate the provided password exactly equals "@rewan10" and reject (trap) otherwise.
- Keep backend in the existing single-actor file (backend/main.mo).

Wire the admin frontend to use the password-authorized backend methods.
- Update React Query admin mutation hooks (frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminMutations.ts) and any admin pages that call them to include the admin password when calling the backend.
- Ensure the password is sourced from the same session-stored value used by the admin password gate.
- If the backend rejects due to missing/invalid password, show a clear English error and return the user to the password prompt state.

Replace the admin-only Principal ID receiver input with a name-based person search and selection.
- In the message compose area shown to admins, remove the freeform Principal ID field.
- Provide a search input that filters people by name (first name + last name) and allows selecting a person; the selection determines the receiver principal.
- The UI must display the selected personâ€™s full name (and may optionally show a shortened principal for disambiguation).
- Keep all user-facing text in English.

Add backend support needed for name-based person search.
- Implement a query method that returns a list of user profiles with their principals (e.g., [{ principal; firstName; lastName; email? }]).
- Implement optional server-side filtering by a provided name search term (case-insensitive contains match on firstName/lastName/full name).
- Ensure the method is only callable by an authorized admin path consistent with the new password-only admin model (i.e., require the admin password).
